paragraph.paragraph:
Use the DB_SELECTION class to select data from the database. Once you have selected the data, you can
../40_selection_access/index.html access it with convenience using adaptative EiffelStore structures.
paragraph.note:
Note: Take a look at the
../50_data_object_coupling/index.html Database/Eiffel objects Coupling if you need information about your database structure.
paragraph.paragraph: DB_SELECTION enables your application to get database content using SQL 'select' queries:

list.item:
You can carry out 'select' queries in an intuitive way using directly the SQL language: Missing Code
Tip: Always check the database status for errors after your 'select' query.

You can also customize your selection using
../60_query_variables/index.html bind variables .
